channel.title: I started 1.0 for the first time, jumped to We've Got Hostiles, and I have marine arms and weapons and marines won't shoot me?
channel.description:
https://imgur.com/a/yT3BOa9
Uhh... So Opposing Source confirmed?
Also marines won't shoot me but will throw grenades. I also have HEV arms when using the pistol. The marines don't want to shoot scientists either...
